channel.title: Great Cases of the 90s Series on YANWE
channel.description: Recent content in Great Cases of the 90s Series on YANWE

item.title: The Headless Corpse on the Flagpole, Section 2 (The Murderer Who Cured the Sick and Saved the World)
item.description: July 1993. I don’t even know how many times the police had a case analysis meeting. During this month, various clues were collected one after another. First, Zhang Jianjun, a qigong master, gave the police a headache. Originally, the police ruled him out, after all, the second murder, he had an absolute alibi. As for why there was a human head and murder weapon in his house? Why did the murderer have to leave his name at the scene?

item.title: The Headless Corpse on the Flagpole, Section 3 (Qigong Masters)
item.description: I wiggled up frantically. This caught the attention of the killer, Zhang Jianjun. He temporarily turned off the intercom and asked me again, “Where are you not feeling well? Do you want to sleep again.” After saying that, he took out a pocket, took out a plastic bag, which was sealed with a white handkerchief. Which I do not understand, immediately shook his head. “Then what did you just wave?
